name: Near you
description: The game Near you is planned as an action adventure, you find yourself in a huge castle, in which several floors, on each floor a lot of rooms. In the rooms there may be monsters, improvements, items, and also you can find secret rooms. The game has several heroes, which can be opened by completing the achievments. Even in the game a bunch of different monsters, most have unique abilities. At the end of each floor you will have a strong boss, only by defeating him you can go to the next floor.
